user_query: I want to know the latest gold, silver, and platinum prices in euros and perform sentiment analysis on tokens 3375 and 3306 from January 10th to January 11th.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest prices of gold, silver, and platinum in euros.
Perform sentiment analysis on token 3375 from January 10th to January 11th.
Perform sentiment analysis on token 3306 from January 10th to January 11th.
